channel.title: Version 2.9 :: Hugo Relearn Theme
channel.description: 2.9.0 (2021-11-19) Breaking Breaking This release removes the themes implementation of ref/relref in favor for Hugoâ€™s standard implementation. This is because of inconsistencies with the themes implementation. In advantage, your project becomes standard compliant and exchanging this theme in your project to some other theme will be effortless.
